distributeChainRewards((address,uint256,.details: Only distributes to referrers based on decay percentages, not the full totalAmount

params.reward: The chain reward data containing base amount for percentage calculations
params.signature: Oracle signature of the reward data

params.rewardHash: The hash of the reward data

authorizeOracle(address).notice: Authorize an oracle to sign reward distributions

getDecayConfig().notice: Get the decay configuration for referral rewards

getOriginalUserPercentage().notice: Get the percentage allocated to the original user

isAuthorizedOracle(address).notice: Check if an address is an authorized oracle

isRewardDistributed(bytes32).notice: Check if a reward has been distributed

setDecayConfig(uint8,uint256,uint256).notice: Set the decay configuration for referral rewards

setOriginalUserPercentage(uint256).notice: Set the percentage allocated to the original user
